title: How to Make Frozen Banana Orange Pushups

steps.headline: Place the orange juice in the refrigerator to thaw.
steps.description: For a quicker method, you can run the container under warm running water. Add it to a blender.

steps.headline: Measure and add the powdered milk, yogurt, and bananas to the blender.
Blend everything until creamy and foam forms at the top.
Make the pops.
steps.description: Carefully pour the mixture into small paper cups, about 3/4 full to allow expansion.

steps.headline: Freeze the cups until the mixture is solid.
Eat the pushup dessert by pushing/squeezing the bottom of the cup upwards.

text: Place the orange juice in the refrigerator to thaw. For a quicker method, you can run the container under warm running water. Add it to a blender. Measure and add the powdered milk, yogurt, and bananas to the blender.  Blend everything until creamy and foam forms at the top.  Make the pops. Carefully pour the mixture into small paper cups, about 3/4 full to allow expansion. Freeze the cups until the mixture is solid.  Eat the pushup dessert by pushing/squeezing the bottom of the cup upwards.  Finished.
